scripts.build-ios: rm -rf ios/BitCoinTest/bundle/; mkdir ios/BitCoinTest/bundle; react-native bundle --reset-cache --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js  --bundle-output ios/BitCoinTest/bundle/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/BitCoinTest/bundle
scripts.build-android: react-native bundle --reset-cache --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
